content: around evenly 8 sts round 5 *2sc decrease in next 2sc* repeat between * * to end of round 6 sts rds 6 11 single_crochet around evenly 6 sts slip_stitch in next single_crochet and bobble leaving a long tail for sewing to body finishing sew the ears to the head and attach the eyes stuff the head and set aside sew the arms and legs to the body and then stuff sew the head onto the body and enjoy your alien bunny ^_^ if you have any questions whatsoever big or small please feel free to contact me at apinchofhope@gmail com or on ravelry my username is apinchofhope or through a pm on etsy this work is licensed under the creative commons attribution-share alike 3 0 united states license to view a copy of this license visit http //creativecommons org/licenses/by-sa/3 0/us/ or send a letter to creative commons 171 second street suite 300 san francisco california 94105 usa
